title: How long did it take for Stephen Hawking to write his books given his medical conditions? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dr. Hawking is physically impaired. His mind is fully engaged. He uses a number of technological advances as well as a host of assistants to write his books. It doesn't take him any longer than it would take any author. It has to do with discipline, time management, acccess and personal habits, not physical challenges.
